algorithm_technique: Simulation with greedy water flow logic
problem_summary_simple: Simulate pouring water onto an elevation map, letting it flow to the lowest possible point.
problem_summary_technical: Simulates water pouring by iteratively finding the lowest reachable point from the drop location, updating the elevation array.
key_insights: Water flows to the lowest point, prioritizing left then right.
The 'eventually fall' condition requires checking multiple steps ahead.
The simulation approach is straightforward but can be slow for large volumes.
